DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate early onset efficacy vortioxetine 17 mg intravenously ( IV ) vortioxetine 10 mg/day oral dose regimen versus vortioxetine 10 mg/day oral dose regimen depressive symptom To evaluate early onset efficacy vortioxetine 17 mg IV vortioxetine 10 mg/day oral dose regimen versus vortioxetine 10 mg/day oral dose regimen - global clinical impression - anxiety symptom To determine population pharmacokinetic parameter vortioxetine
DOC.brief_title: Study Efficacy Safety Initial Administration 17 mg Vortioxetine Intravenously With 10 mg/Day Vortioxetine Orally Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: The patient recurrent Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) , diagnose accord Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , 5th Edition ( DSM5™ ) , classification code ( 296.3x ) . The recurrent Major Depressive Episode ( MDE ) confirm use MiniInternational Neuropsychiatric Interview ( MINI ) . The patient Montgomery Åsberg Depression Rating Scale ( MADRS ) total score ≥30 Screening Baseline Visits . The patient current MDE ≥3 month The patient current psychiatric disorder Axis I disorder ( DSM5™ criterion ) , MDD , assess use Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview ( MINI ) . The patient current diagnosis history manic hypomanic episode , schizophrenia psychotic disorder , include major depression psychotic feature ( DSM5™ criterion ) . The patient suffers personality disorder , intellectual disability , pervasive development disorder , attention deficit/hyperactivity disorder , organic mental disorder , mental disorder due general medical condition ( DSM5™ criterion ) . The patient history lack response previous treatment vortioxetine ( include current episode ) . Other Protocol define inclusion exclusion criterion may apply
